title: Jayakar Peddeli – Curriculum Vitae
text:
Data Science Student · Programmer · Analyst

ped24005@byui.edu | GitHub




Motivated Data Science student at Brigham Young University–Idaho with hands-on experience in Python, data analysis, visualization, and introductory machine learning. Interested in applying data-driven methods to real-world problems and building clear, ethical, and impactful analytical solutions.





Data analysis with Python

Data cleaning and transformation

Exploratory data analysis

Data visualization

Introductory machine learning

Statistical reasoning






Programming: Python

Libraries: pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, lets-plot

Data Skills: data wrangling, feature engineering, validation

Tools: Git, GitHub, VS Code, Quarto

Databases: SQL (basic querying and aggregation)





2023 – Present
Brigham Young University–Idaho
Bachelor’s Degree (in progress)
Field of Study: Data Science / Computer Science–related coursework
Relevant Coursework: - Data Science (Python, data analysis, visualization) - Programming and algorithmic thinking - Introductory statistics and modeling







Performed exploratory data analysis on real-world datasets using Python and pandas

Cleaned and validated messy datasets by handling missing values and inconsistencies

Created visualizations to communicate trends, distributions, and insights





Built and evaluated classification models including logistic regression and decision trees

Interpreted model performance using accuracy, precision, and recall

Applied feature encoding and train-test splits to avoid data leakage

(Note: Course homework projects are intentionally excluded from this portfolio.)








Applied version control using Git and GitHub to manage and publish projects

Used Quarto to create reproducible, professional data science reports and websites

Collaborated on structured assignments emphasizing clarity, documentation, and results







Data science and analytics

Programming and software development

Technology-driven problem solving

Continuous learning and skill development
